Are you somebody looking for a new experience?
subtitles.english: Are you somebody looking for a new experience?

subtitles.english: Or are you simply wanting to get a head start with flexing using super amazing badges and cute emojis?

subtitles.original: Well, you're in luck!
My name is Pavolia Reine, and I'm going to be here explaining briefly what is going on with Pavolia Reine's Membership, (that is mine, by the way).

subtitles.original: At The Royaltea, our super advanced magical technology grants you badge flexing rights,
subtitles.english: At The Royaltea, our super advanced magical technology grants you badge flexing rights,

subtitles.original: which you can constantly show off everytime you're here with us.
subtitles.english: which you can constantly show off everytime you're here with us.

subtitles.original: We also make sure to provide you with utmost care and sense of belonging by granting you a one-of-a-kind experience with cute emojis.
subtitles.english: We also make sure to provide you with utmost care and sense of belonging by granting you a one-of-a-kind experience with cute emojis.

subtitles.original: At just the right price, you'll be able to join our exclusive Royaltea parties
subtitles.english: At just the right price, you'll be able to join our exclusive Royaltea parties

subtitles.original: which also means membership exclusive streams in which we can have various talks, play games together and do other miscellaneous members involvements.
subtitles.english: which also means membership exclusive streams in which we can have various talks, play games together and do other miscellaneous members involvements.

subtitles.original: Like what, you might ask...? Only one way to find out.
subtitles.english: Like what, you might ask...? Only one way to find out.

subtitles.english: And lastly, safety isn't guaranteed but it is a part of our character development training

subtitles.english: in which we aim to build a community of people who like living dangerously.

subtitles.english: We welcome everybody with open arms to join The Royaltea.
